personal_info.name: Kalpa Chandra Das
personal_info.headline: Head of Sales | Driving Revenue Growth, Market Expansion & High-Performing Team in Electrical & Consumer Products | Award-Winning Sales Leader

about:
Career Summary:
•	Accomplished sales leader with over a decade of proven expertise in driving revenue growth, market expansion, and team performance across electrical solutions and consumer products.
•	Demonstrated success in strategic sales planning, key account management, and product portfolio optimization, consistently achieving and surpassing ambitious targets.
•	Adept at leading large, high-performing teams, mentoring sales professionals, and fostering strong dealer and distributor networks nationwide.
•	Skilled in launching new products, executing innovative promotional campaigns, and leveraging customer insights to enhance market competitiveness.
•	Recognized for exceptional leadership, KPI-driven results, and delivering sustainable business growth in dynamic, high-pressure environments.
Objective:
•	To work as a Head of Sales, leading strategic growth, optimizing performance, and expanding market presence.
Key Proficiencies:
•	Sales Strategy & Execution
•	Revenue & Target Achievement
•	Team Leadership & Mentoring
•	Key Account & Dealer/Distributor Management
•	Product Launch & Portfolio Management
•	Budgeting & Forecasting
•	KPI & Performance Management
•	Trade Promotions & Marketing
•	Market Expansion & Business Growth
•	Inventory & Supply Chain Management
•	Customer Insights
•	Corporate Representation
Job Experience:
Head of Sales (Safe Electrical Solutions), Walton Hi-Tech Industries PLC.			 Feb’21 to till now
National Sales Manager 									  May’20 to Jan’21
Divisional Sales Manager							  		  Mar’19 to Apr’20
Divisional Sales Manager (Lighting), Super Star Group 					   Dec’17 to Mar’19
Area In-Charge (Battery & IPS), Rahimafrooz Distribution Ltd.                                                                         Oct’15 to Nov’17
Senior Officer, Nitol Motors Ltd.  								    Jan’13 to Sep’15
Academic Qualification:
•	MBA in Marketing from ASA University Bangladesh with CGPA 3.87 out of 4 in 2014.
•	BBA in MIS from ASA University Bangladesh with CGPA 3.80 out of 4 in 2012.
•	HSC in Business Studies from Noakhali Govt. College with GPA 4.30 out of 5 in 2006.
•	SSC in Science from Char Sita T.A. High School with GPA 3.38 out of 5 in 2004.

education.degree: Master of Business Administration - MBA, Marketing
Bachelor of Business Administration - BBA, MIS
